name: Hoodlum
description:
In a post apocalyptic world overrun with machines, you are one of the few surviving humans. Do you have what it takes to fight your way through the maze of chambers and defeat the central machine, giving humankind one last shot at redemption?

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse to aim, and click to shoot. Learn the game in the tutorial mode before diving in to the high speed action!

A top down shooter made for my Computing and Game Dev course at Plymouth Uni.

Let me know what you think! I'm really proud of what I've made but I'd love to be able to make it better. Thanks for playing!
